pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, November 8, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Moderator of The United Church of Canada the Right Reverend Dr. Richard Bott.

Closed to media.     

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with students from the Royal Military College of Canada Political Science programme.

Closed to media.

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of the Climate Leadership Council Ted Halstead.

Closed to media.

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a reception hosted by the Canadian American Business Council in advance of the Annual State of the Relationship Dinner, and will deliver brief remarks.

Trillium Ballroom, 4th Floor
Shaw Centre
55 Colonel By Drive

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 5:00 p.m.
    • Please note that the Prime Minister will attend the reception only.
